alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 5:58PM CDT until July 22 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Harrison County in southern Mississippi... Southwestern Jackson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gulfport, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, St. Martin, D`iberville, Gulf Hills, Gulf Park Estates, Latimer and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 33 and 57. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
